data.actual_result: The rescale bar goes off of the screen, And you are unable to scroll along.
data.expected_result: I would hope that you are able to rescale without having to enlarge the window to 3 times screen size
data.short_description: 200% zoom + 80% scaling on Mac makes it impossible to downscale [DEVISE SPECIFIC]
data.steps_to_repro: - Set text scaling to 80% - Set Zoom to 200%
